themes: affordable housing and cost of living for artists
unrestricted and significant compensation for artists
prioritizing support for Black, Brown, and lifelong Austinites
healthcare and mental health support for artists
artist-donor/customer relationship management and legal protection
key_phrases: offering housing, or housing stipends, rent subsidy
going to Black, Brown and lifelong Austinites as a priority
insurance or health care for artists who struggle with mental health and part-time jobs
connecting artists with donors and customers
most artists do not have legal resources to navigate contracts
barriers_identified: lack of healthcare and mental health support
lack of legal resources for artists
potential exploitation by donors or customers
solutions_proposed: offering housing, housing stipends, or rent subsidy
providing significant compensation with minimal restrictions
prioritizing Black, Brown, and lifelong Austinites for support
implementing rolling deadlines with quick responses for grants
providing insurance or healthcare for artists
coordinating artist-donor/customer interactions to ensure artist support
